Active Skill.Name: Golden Ruler
Active Skill.Description: Deals Physical Damage (Damage Rate 60%/80%/100%/120%/140%/160%/180%/200%) to all enemies, and has a 60% chance of Disarming the enemy target with the highest Physical Attack and the highest Magical Attack, reducing the damage it deals by 9%/12%/15%/18%/21%/24%/27%/30% for 8s.
